title: FARC suspends campaign over safety concerns
text:
FARC suspends campaign over safety concerns 7:42pm GMT - 01:25 
Colombia's former rebel group, now a political party, on Friday temporarily suspended its presidential and legislative campaigns after angry protests disrupted their campaign stops ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Colombia's former rebel group, now a political party, on Friday temporarily suspended its presidential and legislative campaigns after angry protests disrupted their campaign stops Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://uk.reuters.com/video/2018/02/09/farc-suspends-campaign-over-safety-conce?videoId=399891469&videoChannel=13422
